articles.title: Royal Enfield Interceptor 650-based Scrambler spotted closely! - BikeWale
articles.description: Among the multiple middleweight motorcycles that Royal Enfield is currently working on, one of them is the Interceptor 650-based Scrambler 650. It has been recently spotted at a petrol station and the new spy shots reveals a close image of the bike.
articles.content:
- Will be based on the current Interceptor 650
- To be powered by a 648cc twin-cylinder engine
- Likely to be named the Sherpa 650
